title: New No-Fee Uber Visa Card - up to 4% Cashback
excerpt: Uber has introduced its new Barclaycard co-branded credit card, the Uber Visa Card. Oddly the card only offers 2X earning per $1 spent on Uber rides, but does have some other excellent perks including 4X earning at restaurants and no foreign transactions fees. The restaurant earning, and lack of foreign transaction fees are fantastic for a no annual fee card.
author: Sam Helmy
